p: It looks from here as though the firing of Hargy might mean a bit more safety for Sig - one fired being so much less overhead. Also, this would have fired Sig rather than Hargas hail that seemed in their interest. Just the same, it's hell for Hargas!
The cracker-box sounds interesting and who knows it hadn't a meaning? It's a queer world, as Jesus said when he was crossing the Delaware just before the battle of Waterloo!
I'm crating the stove & will get it started North tomorrow I hope it enjoys its homecoming to K.C. I knew the letter would contain instructions for adjustmetn, so I opened it.
Sounds as tho you're getting warmer in the house-hunt. You'll probably find you're right about
the apartment. It's good to know you're in for just so much & no more.

Have you yet chosen a suitable locality for both parties & then prospected there in on foot? Might be the best way, as you'd have the locality settled at the outset and 1 person can do more & better than any group I expect to have the coconut situation settled today, and, if so I'll have just enough nuts to keep the chimpanzees in a frievoly wood for 5 months, not counting any nuts from lectures.
There are two kewpie dolls here. Laine says I'm hers & I say she's mine - so there you have two kewpie dolls.
I'll not forget when I go to the pasture.
Did I ever show you my crystal ring?
